data.name: EcoHomeAbout1
data.value: EcoHome Financial is a Canadian owned finance company providing custom consumer financing and loan products to the HVAC and home improvement markets. We manage all of our business in-house.

data.name: EcoHomeAbout2
data.value: We partner with leading dealers and manufacturers to deliver what is needed to succeed in today’s competitive arena – hassle free finance programs for dealers and their customers.

data.name: EcoHomeAbout3
data.value: Give your customers the ability to purchase now, and the ability to purchase more. We deliver what you need to succeed.

data.name: AcknowledgeAndAgreementObtainCreditReport
data.value: By submitting this application, you acknowledge and agree that EcoHome Financial is authorized to obtain your credit report from one or more consumer credit reporting agencies (e.g. Equifax or TransUnion), to verify the information in your credit report with third parties as necessary, and to periodically update your credit information with credit reporting agencies. You are hereby notified that a consumer report containing credit and/or personal information may be referred to in connection with this application. You consent to accept, receive and use in electronic form any and all agreements, notices, disclosures and other documents or information in relation to this application that EcoHome Financial may deliver to you.

data.name: ConsentToReceiveCommercialElectronicMessages
data.value: By checking this box, you consent to receive commercial electronic messages from EcoHome Financial at your email address and telephone number(s) provided by you in this application or from time to time in connection with your account, including electronic communications that market or promote our programs, products, services, offers, events and surveys that may be of interest to you. You may withdraw this consent at any time. You may contact EcoHome Financial Inc. at 325 Milner Avenue, Suite 300, Toronto, Ontario M1B 5N1

data.name: EcoHomeAbout1QC
data.value: Services financiers Ecohome is a Canadian owned finance company providing custom consumer financing and loan products to the HVAC and home improvement markets. We manage all of our business in-house.

data.name: AcknowledgeAndAgreementObtainCreditReportDP
data.value: By submitting this application, you acknowledge and agree that EcoHome Financial is authorized to obtain your credit report from one or more consumer credit reporting agencies (e.g. Equifax or TransUnion), to verify the information in your credit report with third parties as necessary, and to periodically update your credit information with credit reporting agencies. You are hereby notified that a consumer report containing credit and/or personal information may be referred to in connection with this application. You consent to accept, receive and use in electronic form any and all agreements, notices, disclosures and other documents or information in relation to this application that EcoHome Financial may deliver to you.

You are hereby notified that a consumer report containing credit and/or personal information may be referred to in connection with this application. You consent to accept, receive and use in electronic form any and all agreements, notices, disclosures and other documents or information in relation to this application that Services financiers Ecohome may deliver to you.

You may withdraw this consent at any time. You may contact EcoHome Financial Inc. at 325 Milner Avenue, Suite 300, Toronto, Ontario M1B 5N1
